meanings.definition: Causing or inducing sleep or drowsiness.
meanings.sent1: The soft music made the room feel even snoozier.
meanings.sent2: After a long day, the cozy bed looked even snoozier.
meanings.sent3: The snoozier atmosphere in the library almost made me nod off.
meanings.sent4: The monotony of the lecture made the classroom feel snoozier than ever.
meanings.sent5: The gentle rocking of the hammock created a snoozier environment for relaxation.

meanings.definition: More boring or uninteresting than something else.
meanings.sent1: The documentary about rocks was snoozier than the action movie.
meanings.sent2: I find history class snoozier than science class.
meanings.sent3: The snoozier book on the shelf seemed to be gathering dust.
meanings.sent4: The meeting became even snoozier when the speaker started reading from slides.
meanings.sent5: The snoozier parts of the movie made me wish for some excitement.
